<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Voice of the Night](/Feats.aspx?ID=5718) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=750" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You hear and understand the words of creatures you share the darkness with. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) skill with bats, rats, and wolves. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Make an Impression on such animals.
name: Voice of the Night
